info.name: personlize google
info.description:
you can personlize google 
this should work on the most popular TLD's but you can add your own
info.additionalInfo:
you can personlize google 

this should work on google.dk google.com google.de google.fr google.it google.ca and google.hk if your contry is missing. dont worry it is simple to add a domain just edit the style and in the @-moz-document domain add your TLD
